feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:45 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24.
